Method Detail

delete

public static void delete(File file)
Quietly deletes an existing file; In most cases you just want to cleanup temporary files and throwing exceptions is useless. This method DOES NOT throw any exception, only significant errors will be logged (example: if file after the delete still exists)

Parameters:
file - - File object, could be null

deleteFile

public static boolean deleteFile(Object src)
Delete a file; This method DOES NOT throw any exception, any errors will be logged.

Parameters:
src - - a String with a filename or File object
Returns:
true, if file was deleted successfully or never existed;

locateConfigurationFile

public static File locateConfigurationFile(String filePath)
                                    throws IOException
Locates a configuration file. If file is not found will try to find the file in the WEB-INF and "config" sub-folders.

Parameters:
filePath - a file path or filename
Returns:
File object
Throws:
IOException - if path is null, or the file was not found

moveFile

public static void moveFile(String fromFilePath,
                            String toFilePath,
                            boolean allowOverride)
                     throws IOException,
                            IllegalArgumentException
Move from one file to another; if OS dependant rename fails, trys a copy/delete method

Parameters:
fromFilePath - source file
toFilePath - destination file
allowOverride - allow override existing destination file
Throws:
IOException - if fails to create a destination file or its parent directories
IllegalArgumentException - if any of the from/to files are null
